Allocated objects: Number of total allocated Ruby garbage collector objects.

Freed objects: Number of freed Ruby garbage collector objects.

Unprotected wb objects: Number of unprotected wb Ruby garbage collector objects.

Old objects: Number of old Ruby garbage collector objects.

panels.description:
